name: versionhistory_platforms_list
description: Returns list of platforms that are available for a given product. The resource "product" has no resource name in its name.

parent.description: Required. The product, which owns this collection of platforms. Format: {product}

pageSize.description: Optional. Optional limit on the number of channels to include in the response. If unspecified, the server will pick an appropriate default.

pageToken.description: Optional. A page token, received from a previous `ListChannels` call. Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$ul: **nextPageToken**: A token, which can be sent as `page_token` to retrieve the next page. If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.
